articles.title: Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of New Multiple Launch Rocket System
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Guides Test-fire of New Multiple Launch Rocket System
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. imperialists and their followers' flagrant moves for political and economic pressure and military aggression on the DPRK have gone to a grave phase that can no longer be overlooked. They committed a ferocious hostility of illegalizing the DPRK's independent rights as a sovereign state by adopting an unprecedented and gangster-like, new "resolution of sanctions" over its bolstering of self-defensive deterrent and legitimate launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4.
					 All the people in the DPRK are now waiting for an order of combat to annihilate the enemy with their surging wrath at the U.S. imperialists and south Korea's Park Geun Hye group of traitors.
					
					 Under such situation, there took place a test-fire for estimating the might of controlled ordnance rocket warhead for large-caliber multiple launch rocket system of new type to be deployed in the reserve artillery units of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, guided the test-fire on the spot.
					
					 At an observation post he learnt in detail about the planned test-fire of new-type large-caliber multiple launch rocket system and the tactical and technological specifications of controlled ordnance rocket and gave an order on starting the test-fire.
					
					 The test-fire in various ways with fragmentation mine shell, under-ground penetration shell and scattering shell showed that the ordnance rocket warhead, made in combination with high-energy material, has amazing destructivity and killing power.
					
					 Kim Jong Un was very satisfied to see controlled ordnance rocket hitting accurately and destroying to pieces the strongly-built simulated enemy personnel, tank, artillery and vehicle shelters.
					
					 He said the development of Juche weapon representing the era of the dignified Workers' Party is a proud result from the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il, who had dedicated their mental and physical efforts to the strengthening of the Juche-based defence capability, and from the Party's policy of attaching importance to the defence science and technology. At the same time, it eloquently shows the tremendous potentials of the DPRK's self-supporting defence industry, he added.
					
					 The serial production of Korean-style large-caliber multiple launch rocket system of new type helps further strengthen the striking power of the Korean People's Army qualitatively, he said with satisfaction.
					
					 The situation has reached a very dangerous phase that can no longer be neglected as the enemies are intent on such last-ditch attempt as "beheading operation" and "collapse of social system" while working hard to violate the dignity and sovereignty of the DPRK and its right to existence, he said, adding: Now is the time for us to convert our mode of military counteraction toward the enemies into an preemptive attack one in every aspect.
					
					 It is a very foolish act for Park Geun Hye to cry for "preemptive attack" while recklessly beefing up the armed forces in league with the U.S. scoundrels, but her hysteria will precipitate only her ruin in the long run, he noted.
					
					 He said that the DPRK would see how the enemies, seeking to deprive it of the independent right to use space for peaceful purposes, talk about and move over the test-fire of its new weapons system held today, with their large-scale joint military exercises against it ahead.
					
					 He stressed that the national defence sector should deploy at an early date new-type large-caliber multiple launch rocket system and other recently- developed strike weapons in the operation areas of the Supreme Command so as not to allow the enemies to sleep in peace till the moment they meet their final end in their land.
					
					 The only way for defending the sovereignty of our nation and its right to existence under the present extreme situation is to bolster up nuclear force both in quality and quantity and keep balance of forces, he said, stressing the need to get the nuclear warheads deployed for national defence always on standby so as to be fired any moment.
					
					 He expressed belief that the officials, scientists and technicians engaged in the defence science would steadily develop new-type ultra-modern strike arms and equipment, make a fresh leaping progress in the strengthening of military capability this year greeting the Seventh Congress of the WPK and thus consolidate the country's defence capability as firm as a rock.
					
					 He was accompanied by Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the C.C., WPK, Hong Yong Chil and Kim Jong Sik, vice department directors of the C.C., WPK, and Army Colonel General Yun Tong Hyon, vice-minister of the People's Armed Forces.

articles.title: DPRK Govt. Spokesman Clarifies Its Stand to Resolutely Counter UN "Resolution on Sanctions"
articles.content:
DPRK Govt. Spokesman Clarifies Its Stand to Resolutely Counter UN "Resolution on Sanctions"
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the government of the DPRK issued the following statement Friday:
					 Being taken aback by the H-bomb test of the DPRK and its successful launch of earth satellite Kwangmyongsong-4, the U.S. and other big powers and their followers finally fabricated "resolution No. 2270 calling for harsh sanctions" against the DPRK by abusing the name of the UN Security Council at the dawn on Thursday.
					
					 No sooner had the "resolution" been adopted than Obama published "a welcoming message" and let State Secretary Kerry make public "a statement supporting" it. Riff-raffs blindly echoed their statements one after another.
					
					 Trumpeting about the efficacy of the "resolution", the U.S. published "its own sanctions" in which leading officials of the army and government of the DPRK are put on the list of "special sanctions." 
					
					 Following suit, Japan made public Abe's "commentary" and Foreign Minister Kishida's "statement" in support of the "resolution".
					
					 Even the Park Geun Hye group of south Korea issued a "statement" at midnight, describing the "sanctions" as the "harshest and comprehensive sanctions" and "strong message".
					
					 Terror-stricken by the H-bomb blast and successful launch of Kwangmyongsong-4 that shook the world at the outset of this year, the U.S. and other big powers and their followers held a confab for 57 days, cooking up the "resolution on sanctions." It was, therefore, nothing surprising and new as it was predicted.
					
					 What matters is that the "resolution" is the most undisguised and the most hideous international crime aimed to isolate and stifle the independent and righteous sovereign state under the unjustified pretexts.
					
					 As already clarified, the H-bomb test of the DPRK was a step for bolstering up the nuclear deterrence to safeguard the sovereignty and the right to existence of the nation from the U.S. hostile policy to invade the country and its increasing nuclear threats. The DPRK's satellite launch was the exercise of the universally recognized legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The government of the DPRK clarifies its stand before the world as follows as regards the fact that the U.S. and other big powers and their followers fabricated in conspiracy the UNSC "resolution on sanctions", gravely threatening the sovereignty of the DPRK and blatantly challenging its just cause:
					
					 Firstly, the DPRK brands the UNSC's vicious "resolution on sanctions" as the most outrageous provocation against the DPRK, the dignified independent and sovereign state, and categorically rejects it. 
					
					 The "resolution" is a criminal document fabricated by the UNSC tasked to preserve global peace and security in wanton violation of the international justice and impartiality, dancing to the tune of the U.S. and other big powers and their followers after reneging on its mission and duty. 
					
					 The DPRK has never recognized any UN "resolution on sanctions" against it. 
					
					 Secondly, the DPRK will take resolute counter-measures as the U.S. and other big powers and their followers have become undisguised in their moves to trample down the DPRK's sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					 The DPRK's counter-measures will involve all various means and methods including strong and merciless physical counter-actions.
					
					 The DPRK will not remain a passive onlooker to the infringement upon its sovereignty and right to existence.
					
					 If an incident not desired by anyone happens in the Korean Peninsula and its vicinity, the U.S. and other big powers and their followers and those who sponsored the UN "resolution on sanctions" will be held wholly accountable for the ensuing consequences. 
					
					 Thirdly, the DPRK will launch a more dynamic worldwide struggle to put a definite end to the unfair and unequal international political order with the recent hideous international crime committed by the UNSC as a momentum.
					
					 The DPRK can no longer take a fence-sitting attitude towards the trend of the world where justice and impartiality are violated and double standards and injustice are rampant.
					
					 It is the DPRK's stand not to allow the reality in which the legality and illegality are deliberately confused and justice and truth ruthlessly trampled down by the yardstick of the U.S. and other big powers.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever firmly hold the banner of the line of developing the two fronts and further bolster up the self-defensive nuclear deterrent and dynamically advance along the road already chosen towards the eminence of satellite power no matter what others may say.
					
					 The world will clearly see how the DPRK, reacting against the UN "resolution on sanctions" with a thousand-fold counter-measures, puts an end to the crime-woven history of the UN dominated by the U.S. and other big powers and the dolts toeing their lines and establishes international justice and impartiality.

articles.title: DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Rejects UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions"
articles.content:
DPRK Foreign Ministry Spokesman Rejects UNSC "Resolution on Sanctions" 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the DPRK Foreign Ministry issued the following statement on Thursday:
					 The U.S. fabricated another "resolution on sanctions" by abusing the UNSC, while finding fault with the DPRK's H-bomb test and satellite launch.
					
					 The "resolution" unprecedented in its viciousness and illegality is a brigandish product which can never be justified.
					
					 If the access to nuclear weapons is to be called into question, the U.S., the first country in the world which had access to nuclear weapons and the only user of them, should be done so and if any fault is to be found with the DPRK's access to nuclear weapons, it is imperative to pull up the U.S. over the hostile policy and nuclear threat toward the DPRK for which it is responsible.
					
					 The DPRK's access to nuclear weapons is an unavoidable option for self-defense made by it as the U.S., the world biggest nuclear weapons state and the only user of the nuclear weapons, designated the dignified DPRK as an "axis of evil" and target of a preemptive nuclear strike and has persistently escalated the hostile moves and nuclear threats to the DPRK by introducing various kinds of lethal hardware for a nuclear war.
					
					 The DPRK's H-bomb test and satellite launch are being termed a breach of the previous "resolutions" of the UNSC but, in essence, those "resolutions" are a product of high-handedness practiced beyond the mandate of the UNSC.
					
					 If the UNSC has the mandate to ban an individual country from conducting a nuclear test, what does the NPT exist for and what is the nuclear test ban treaty necessary for?
					
					 As for the satellite launch, it is the legitimate right of a sovereign state.
					
					 The DPRK shaped the 5-year program for national aerospace development through the legitimate exercise of the independent right recognized by international law and according to it successfully launched earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4 which is now under normal operation.
					
					 Where in the UN Charter is the mandate investing the UNSC with the right to deprive an individual UN member nation of the right to use space for peaceful purposes, a right specified in international law, stipulated?
					
					 If the DPRK's satellite launch is to be found fault with, it is necessary to call into question all countries that launched satellites including the U.S.
					
					 The U.S., preoccupied with the hostility toward the DPRK, went so crude as not to hesitate to devise "luxury goods" as embargo items in a bid to prohibit the DPRK from importing even sports apparatuses such as ski resort facilities which have nothing to do with the development of weaponry.
					
					 Underlying it is a vicious hostile purpose and nature against human rights aimed to arrest happy laughs of people from being heard from such cultural recreation grounds as the Masikryong Ski Resort in the DPRK and to prevent its people from enjoying highly civilized socialist life, the promise the Workers' Party of Korea made to them, and, furthermore, to bring down the social system of the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK bitterly denounces and totally rejects all "resolutions" against it including the recent "resolution", which are being misused for sinister political purpose of a big power in wanton violation of the independent right, right to development and right to existence of the sovereign state, as the criminal documents devoid of impartiality, legitimacy and morality.
					
					 Many member nations of the United Nations, small countries, in particular, are getting increasingly vocal in their call for the democratic reform of the UN Security Council the most undemocratic and unfair old structure and nature of which are still left intact within the UN machinery. And they are expressing their protest by ignoring unreasonable resolutions of the UNSC.
					
					 The DPRK, a country that covered the path of self-reliance and self-development in face of the U.S. sanctions and blockade, recently took the path it should have taken, while being fully aware that the U.S. would slap sanctions again.
					
					 The DPRK's self-development-first principle is the strength of the courageous people who emerged as a H-bomb state and satellite launching state by dint of its indigenous wisdom and technology with firm belief in their own efforts despite the U.S. ceaseless hostile policy and sanctions that lasted for more than seven decades.
					
					 It is a serious miscalculation to think that sanctions would work on the DPRK.
					
					 The DPRK's bolstering up of the nuclear deterrent is an exercise of the just right to self-defence which should be done constantly as long as the U.S. persists in its hostile policy, and the DPRK's satellite launch is the work for space development pursuant to the legitimate right of a sovereign state which should be done ceaselessly forever irrelevant to the U.S. hostile policy whose termination is still up in the air.
					
					 The world will soon witness more steps and actions to be taken by the DPRK on its path of successfully implementing the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts.
					
					 The U.S. will be wholly responsible for the total failure of the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula as it refused to the last the abandonment of its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: CPRK Spokesman Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime of Its Hideous Crimes against Nation
articles.content:
CPRK Spokesman Accuses Park Geun Hye Regime of Its Hideous Crimes against Nation
Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) made public a statement Friday as regards the fact that Park Geun Hye pressurized the "National Assembly" to fabricate the "law on human rights in the north" and "anti-terrorism law", evil laws escalating confrontation with the fellow countrymen, on March 2, adding to her high treasons.
					The fabrication of the laws is an unpardonable grave provocation to the DPRK and a hideous crime against the nation, pushing the inter-Korean relations to the brink of a war, the statement said, and went on:
					
					All those who visited the DPRK admire the true picture of its social system under which the policy of giving priority to the people and respecting and loving them is fully enforced.
					
					Philistines of south Korea and international human rights tricksters, who know nothing about the DPRK as they have never been to it, fabricated the "law on human rights" on the basis of the false information provided by a handful of human scum who defected to south Korea after committing hideous crimes and abandoning their country and families, and are talkative about "human rights" issue in the DPRK. This is an impudent political charade and undisguised mockery of the public at home and abroad.
					
					The fabrication of the "anti-terrorism law" against the DPRK is a political cartoon without an equal in the world that makes even their American master, kingpin of international terrorism, blush and a foolish act to tarnish the image of the dignified DPRK and tighten the siege network for isolating and stifling the DPRK.
					
					Through the fabrication of the laws Park Geun Hye brought to light her true colors as an outrageous confrontation maniac, fascist tyrant without an equal in the world and traitor for all ages.
					
					All the servicepersons and people of the DPRK will take decisive and resolute countermeasures against the Park Geun Hye group of traitors as it dared challenge the dignity and social system in the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to President-elect of Central Africa
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Sends Congratulatory Message to President-elect of Central Africa
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a congratulatory message to Faustin Archange Touadera upon his election as president of Central Africa.
					 The message wished the president-elect and the people of Central Africa fresh success in the work for political stability of the country and its national unity and independent development.
					
					 It expressed belief that the excellent relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Central Africa would grow stronger.

articles.title: Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Ghana
articles.content:
Kim Yong Nam Greets President of Ghana
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Friday sent a message of greeting to John Dramani Mahama, president of the Republic of Ghana, on the 59th anniversary of its independence.
					 The message wished the president and government of Ghana success in the work for the progress and prosperity of Ghana, expressing the belief that the traditional relations of friendship and cooperation between the DPRK and Ghana would grow stronger.

articles.title: 70th Anniversary of Promulgation of Agrarian Reform Law Observed in DPRK
articles.content:
70th Anniversary of Promulgation of Agrarian Reform Law Observed in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The army and people of the DPRK observe the 70th anniversary of the promulgation of the Agrarian Reform Law.
					 President Kim Il Sung set forth a slogan "Land to the Tillers!" based on the practical experience gained in the flames of the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle and promulgated the "Law on Agrarian Reform in North Korea" which was worked out by himself on March 5, Juche 35 (1946) on the basis of the preparations for enforcing the agrarian reform.
					
					 The promulgation serves as a historical event as it hewed out a new brilliant history of solving the issues of peasants and agriculture in Korea.
					
					 The law is a Juche-based land revolutionary programme that realized a long-cherished desire of the Korean peasants to become genuine masters of land, and a land code as it settled for good and all the feudal relations of land ownership deeply rooted in the rural areas of Korea and opened a way of uninterrupted revolution toward socialism.
					
					 A national meeting to mark the 70th anniversary of the promulgation of the law took place at the Central Youth Hall on Friday.
					
					 Present there were Pak Pong Ju, Yang Hyong Sop, Kwak Pom Gi, Ro Tu Chol and the vice-premier and concurrently minister of Agriculture, the chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, officials of ministries and national institutions, those of party, power and agricultural guidance organs in the city and agricultural workers.
					
					 A report was made by Pak Pong Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and premier of the DPRK Cabinet.
					
					 He said that the history of 70 years from the effectuation of the agrarian reform shines as proud chronicle in which the revolutionary change and advance unprecedented in the national history were made in the socialist rural areas in the DPRK under the wise leadership of the party and the leaders.
					
					 He noted that the exploits performed by Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in opening a new history of change in socialist rural construction and providing the eternal foundation for the Juche-oriented agricultural development would shine forever along with the history of building a thriving nation.
					
					 He called upon the officials and workers in the agricultural field to certainly attain the grain production goal set forth by the Party this year by carrying forward the fighting spirit and trait of patriotic farmers of the preceding generations.

articles.title: Literary Works Created to Encourage Participants in 70-day Campaign
articles.content:
Literary Works Created to Encourage Participants in 70-day Campaign 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Writers of the DPRK have produced a lot of literary works such as novels, epics and long poems, nearly 2 000 in all, through their creative activities since the first day of the 70-day campaign to arouse all the service personnel and people to party-wide, nationwide and all-people general mobilization offensive and death-defying campaign.
					 Among them are long poem "Let's dash toward future" and full-length novel "Miru Plain".
					
					 The writers of the Central Committee of the Writers Union of Korea visited the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Pyongyang Thermal Power Complex and various other units in Pyongyang and handed aid materials to the workers. They conducted frontline-style information and agitation activities and created literary works strong in appeal as they reflect the spirit of the times. 
					
					 The writers of South Hamgyong, Kangwon and all other provinces are also active in the Hamhung Youth Electric Appliances Plant, the construction site of stockbreeding base in Sepho area and other major industrial establishments and construction sites.

articles.title: Project of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station Progresses Apace
articles.content:
Project of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station Progresses Apace
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The construction of Paektusan Hero Youth Power Station No. 3 has been pushed forward in the DPRK.
					 From the outset of the 70-day campaign, the fulfillment of daily construction plan grew 1.5 times.
					
					 As of March 2, concrete tamping for core wall was completed at 74.8 percent, dam building at 50 percent, tamping for substructure of generator room at 85 percent and drain excavation at 75 percent.
					
					 Remarkable successes have also been witnessed at relevant units.
					
					 The Chollima Steel Complex, Kyongsong Insulator Factory and Sangwon and Sunchon cement complexes fulfilled their quotas on the project.
					
					 For the past nine days since the start of the 70-day campaign, the production and assembly of equipment like turbine and transformer reached 98 percent, up 23 percent from 75 percent before the campaign, at the Taean Heavy Machine Complex.
					
					 The same is true of the Ranam Coal-mining Machine Complex and the Chongjin Metal Construction Complex.

articles.title: Protection of Goshawk Active in DPRK
articles.content:
Protection of Goshawk Active in DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Sangdol-ri and Sinthae-ri in Toksong County, South Hamgyong Province of the DPRK have been recently set as a sanctuary for goshawk (Accipiter gentilis), its national bird, as part of the efforts to protect and breed it.
					 Now forest resource is well conserved in the area where is abundant in 30-40 meter-high pine trees, larches and poplars habitable for goshawk.
					
					 Meanwhile, a group consisting of over 10 squads was organized by the Zoology Research Institute under the State Academy of Sciences to develop research into this bird.
					
					 In the recent one year, those squads confirmed the range of goshawks in the northern and mid-western parts and Kangwon Province of the country and made successes in ascertaining the morphological characters of goshawk and its breeding behavior.
					
					 A research into five goshawks hatched out in July 2015 assures that it is possible to grow goshawk artificially.
					
					 The research group is planning to complete the methods of artificially bringing up and taming goshawks in the on-going 70-day campaign.

articles.title: Increased Production Witnessed in Light Industry
articles.content:
Increased Production Witnessed in Light Industry
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The on-going 70-day campaign of loyalty in the DPRK gives a boost to the production in the field of light industry.
					 According to data available, textile mills and knitwear and shoe factories have carried out their production plan 1.1 times, 3.2 times and 2.5 times respectively on all indices.
					
					 Typical of them are the Kim Jong Suk Pyongyang Textile Mill, the Kusong Textile Mill, the September Textile Mill and the Hamhung Woolen Mill which are taking the lead in the campaign by increasing the production of cotton yarn and cloth 1.5 times through a multi-spindle, multi-loom tending movement.
					
					 Increased production has also been witnessed at the Songyo Knitwear Factory, the Pyongyang Children's Knitted Goods Factory, the Kanggye Knitwear Factory, the Hamhung Knitwear Factory and other knitwear factories across the country. 
					
					 And the work to introduce technical innovations has been steadily carried on to develop world-competitive famous products and goods at those mills and factories.
					
					 Meanwhile, the Wonsan Shoes Factory, Ryuwon Shoes Factory, Pyongyang Leather Shoes Factory and other shoes factories have made big strides in keeping the production going on a high level and producing shoes diverse and smart in shapes and light in weight.

articles.title: Progress Made in Machine-building Industry of DPRK
articles.content:
Progress Made in Machine-building Industry of DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- A brisk movement for developing new products and speeding up the production of equipment is now going on in the machine-building industry of the DPRK.
					 The Kusong Machine Tool Factory recently developed a CNC spherical processing lathe and the Pyongyang Cermet Tools Development Company launched a drive to produce high-purity hard alloy powder of different grades based on domestic raw materials and various types of high-performance bites and wafers.
					
					 The Taean Heavy Machine Complex is speeding up the production of ordered equipment for the construction of power stations, while a signal production success is reported from the Ryongsong Machine Complex and the Pyongyang Electric Cable Factory 326.
					
					 The Ministry of Machine-building Industry has taken necessary measures to carry out its first half-yearly plan ahead of schedule.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Chief Executive of Her Reckless Remarks
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses S. Korean Chief Executive of Her Reckless Remarks 
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Chief executive of south Korea Park Geun Hye, addressing an event commemorating the anniversary of the March 1st movement, described the March 1st movement as a historic event in which the Korean people pooled efforts to take back the usurped country and talked nonsense that this spirit helped build an "independent and prosperous" south Korea. In her address she did not forget to slander the DPRK as a "provocateur".
					 In a word, what she uttered was nothing but shameless and sheer sophism.
					
					 The flurry of jargons spouted by her even at the event commemorating the anniversary of the March First Popular Uprising which recorded a glorious chapter in the history of the Koreans' struggle for national liberation was a challenge to the sacred national history of the struggle for protecting sovereignty.
					
					 The March First Popular Uprising was a nationwide resistance against the Japanese imperialists in which the Koreans turned out as one to win back the dignity of the nation and sovereignty usurped by the ferocious Japanese imperialists.
					
					 Through this heroic resistance, the Korean people powerfully demonstrated before the whole world that the Korean nation had a high sense of independence as it was possessed of the indomitable spirit and warm patriotism of risking any sacrifice for the sovereignty of the country.
					
					 Had Park been a woman with an elementary thinking power and face, she should have kept mum and looked back upon her miserable position and the crimes committed by her group against the nation. 
					
					 South Korea is not a society with "freedom and prosperity" as claimed by her but a colonial and corrupt one increasingly depending on the U.S. master in political, economic and military aspects.
					
					 In recent years the south Korean puppet group has concealed and overlooked the fact that the U.S. imperialists have conducted dangerous germ warfare experiments after introducing pest, botulinus and toxic germs into south Korea dozens of times.
					
					 When the U.S. criminal scenario for germ warfare was disclosed by media, sparking criticism from the Korean nation and the world, she perpetrated such act of treachery as describing it as a "meaningful project" before the U.S. master.
					
					 She brought about a series of changes in the "economic policy" and spent a huge amount of money to save the economy from bankruptcy caused by the U.S. colonial policy, but they proved counter-productive.  They did not help increase household income. Household debt jumped to 1 200 trillion won.
					
					 Due to the extremely tense situation caused by the ceaseless nuclear war drills with the U.S., south Korea's export-oriented industry is in the doldrums, putting economy on the verge of bankruptcy.
					
					 In recent days Park was upbeat over her master's commitment to deploying THAAD in south Korea but she is now running helter-skelter as the situation turned unfavorable to her.
					
					 South Korea has never exercised a sovereign right for several decades since the liberation of Korea from the Japanese imperialists' colonial rule. It is a political caricature for this poor colonial slave to talk about "freedom and prosperity." 
					
					 Her shameless rigmarole about "freedom and prosperity" is nothing but a third-rate trick to embellish the miserable reality of south Korea where nothing has changed for the better in the past three years of her office and calm down the angry public by hurling mud at the compatriots in the north and mislead public opinion to prolong her dirty remaining days.
					
					 With no rhetoric can the puppet group of south Korea cover up and justify their unpardonable acts of treachery.
					
					 Running high is the resentment of the nation at the Park group.
					
					 The traitors are fated to face a stern punishment by history.

articles.title: Park Geun Hye Jeered as Cheap Pro-American Parrot
articles.content:
Park Geun Hye Jeered as Cheap Pro-American Parrot
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Kim Un Gyong, bird raiser at a zoo in the DPRK, released an article titled "Matchlessly cheap parrot bred by America".
					 In the article Kim said Park Geun Hye cannot but be likened to a die-hard pro-American parrot.
					
					 Reminding the readers of how Park went hurry-scurry, being shocked by the loud blast of the first H-bomb conducted by her fellow countrymen and the launch of earth observation satellite Kwangmyongsong-4, Kim called Park a parrot.
					
					 The article continued:
					
					 Making a speech at the "National Assembly" in mid February she repeated even 12 times the anti-DPRK phrases "collapse of social system" and "isolation and blockade." 
					
					 She always echoes her American master's assertions, being deprived of her thinking faculty for understanding the reality.
					
					 The U.S. announced "super-tough additional sanctions against the north" on Jan. 12 and Feb. 11, taking issue with the DPRK's H-bomb test and satellite launch.
					
					 After quickly echoing the intentions of her master, Park began reeling off a whole string of jargons in public appearance.
					
					 When she flew into America, she read through the speech written by her U.S. master.
					
					 She obeys the Yankees, the sworn enemy of the Korean people, but spouts vituperations and violent remarks full of jealousy, hostility and confrontation with the fellow countrymen in the north.
					
					 She is the wickedest woman who makes reckless remarks which her U.S. master dares not spout for fear of world criticism.
					
					 She is nothing but a poor and stupid parrot of the U.S. in human skin as she does not know her persistent tongue-lashing would only precipitate her doom.
					
					 Parrots in aviaries of the zoo please visitors for parroting nice words but Park does everything evil. It is, therefore, the unanimous demand of the people that she be finished off at once as she is a devil inciting confrontation and war to drive the whole Korean nation into uneasiness and fear.
					
					 The doom of Park, the traitor without an equal in the world, is rapidly drawing nearer, concluded the article.

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Coming War Exercises under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Coming War Exercises under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The U.S. and the Park Geun Hye group of traitors are mulling kicking off joint military exercises Key Resolve and Foal Eagle 16 on March 7.
					 The warmongers are set to stage the largest-ever exercises, openly revealing their scenario for "bringing down the social system" in the DPRK.
					
					 According to OPLAN 5015, they plan to stage the drills under the simulated conditions to carry out the "beheading operation" meaning a preemptive strike for "removing" in advance the "one having the right to order" to deter the "use" of nuclear weapons and strategic rockets of the DPRK and the "operation" for disabling its nuclear and strategic rocket forces.

articles.title: Anti-U.S. Action Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Anti-U.S. Action Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Members of the Christian Pastors' Group for Peaceful Action of south Korea burnt the Stars and Stripes as part of their anti-U.S. action in front of the U.S. embassy on Mar. 1, according to the south Korean internet paper Jaju Sibo.
					 Running sky-high in south Korea is the anger of its people at the U.S., chieftain of Korea's division and source of all evils, attempting another large-scale joint military drills to bring the danger of war to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The religionists chanted anti-U.S. slogans.

articles.title: S. Korean Media Accuse Park Geun Hye of Her Confrontational Remarks against Compatriots
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Accuse Park Geun Hye of Her Confrontational Remarks against Compatriots
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The south Korean internet paper Voice of People Wednesday carried an editorial blaming traitor Park Geun Hye for her remarks crying out for sycophancy and confrontation with the compatriots in the north.
					 The editorial chided Park for making vague remarks in her "address made at the event observing the March 1 movement", far from warning Japan of its wrong understanding of its past and lurch to the right.
					
					 Saying that the most part of her address was not the issues related to Japan but those related to the north, the editorial accused Park of her "hard-line" remarks against the north.
					
					 The editorial recalled that Park talked about "dialogue" though she did not mention for some time, aware that her stand was not in line with the trend of the international community, adding that her remark was little short of evading the responsibility for bedeviling the south-north relations.

articles.title: Japanese Institute Urges Government to Lift Sanctions against DPRK
articles.content:
Japanese Institute Urges Government to Lift Sanctions against DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The Ehime Institute for Contemporary Korean Issue in Japan sent a letter of protest to Prime Minister Abe on Feb. 17 as regards the government's decision to slap independent sanctions against the DPRK.
					 The letter said:
					
					 The DPRK clarified that its H-bomb test was a self-defensive measure for safeguarding the country's sovereignty and nation's right to existence from the nuclear threats posed by the U.S.-led hostile forces.
					
					 It also made it clear that its satellite launch is a proud exercise of its independent right to use space for peaceful purposes.
					
					 We sympathize with the DPRK's assertion and view.
					
					 Firstly, the Japanese government's sanctions are a breach of the Japan-DPRK inter-governmental Stockholm agreement.
					
					 Secondly, they are foolish measures that can never be tolerated as they will blatantly encroach upon the national rights and human rights of Koreans in Japan and block every dialogue channel between Japan and the DPRK.
					
					 So we urge the government to immediately lift the sanctions.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Foreign Personages
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Celebrations took place in Serbia, Benin and Spain from February 11 to 15 on the occasion of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star).
					 The general secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party of Serbia praised Kim Jong Il as an outstanding leader and benevolent father who devoted his all to the world socialist movement, the development of the movement for national liberation and happiness of the Korean people.
					
					 His feats for the building of a thriving socialist nation in the DPRK and global independence will always be remembered by the Korean people and other progressives, the general secretary said.
					
					 The international secretary of the New Yugoslav Communist Party who doubles as chairman of the Serbian preparatory committee for celebrating the Day of the Shining Star noted that the revolutionary cause of Kim Jong Il is being successfully carried forward by Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The chairman of the Benin-Korea Amicable Association "Long Live Kim Jong Il, Supreme Leader" stressed that Kim Jong Il developed the Workers' Party of Korea into an ever-victorious party fully representing the interests of the popular masses, deeply rooted among them, and thus opened a turning phase in building a thriving socialist nation.

articles.title: Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Shining Star Celebrated Abroad
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Meetings in celebration of the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il (the Day of the Shining Star) took place in Kyrgyzstan, Bulgaria and Laos from February 11 to 16.
					 The chairman of the Central Council of the People Unity-"Kyrgyz El" Republican Political Party said Kim Jong Il successfully carried forward the noble cause of President Kim Il Sung, founding father of socialist Korea, and turned the DPRK into a political and ideological power and military power.
					
					 Kim Jong Il in the late last century frustrated the ever-more escalating moves of the imperialists to isolate and stifle the DPRK and firmly defended Korean-style socialism.
					
					 The chairman of the Bulgaria-Korea Friendship Association and other speakers said that Kim Jong Il devoted his all to prosperity of the country and happiness of its people and global independence till the last moments of his noble life.
					
					 His great exploits will go down in history.
					
					 Congratulatory messages to supreme leader Kim Jong Un were adopted at the meetings held in Kyrgyzstan and Bulgaria.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Syrian Media
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Feats Lauded by Syrian Media
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Syrian media observed the birth anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il in their special write-ups.
					 SANA posted on its website an article illustrated with his photo. The article said that he was an extraordinary thinker and theoretician and great man who formulated the revolutionary idea of President Kim Il Sung into the integral system of ideology, theory and method of Juche, developed socialism centered on the popular masses and built powerful revolutionary armed forces.
					
					 The TV Channel introduced in detail his exploits with footage documenting his revolutionary activities.
					
					 It also screened a video dealing with the achievements made by the service personnel and people of the DPRK in socialist construction under the wise guidance of the peerlessly great man and the might of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 The central radio aired a special program on his revolutionary career and feats.
					
					 The newspapers Al Nour and Al Baath carried articles introducing his ideological and theoretical exploits and Songun leadership feats.
					
					 The newspaper Al Thawrah carried an article titled "Korean people celebrate 74th birth anniversary of HE Kim Jong Il, his life dedicated to justice and prosperity of country."

articles.title: U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-DPRK Moves under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. and S. Korean Warmongers' Anti-DPRK Moves under Fire
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- Alhassan Mamman Muhammad, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism, released a statement on Feb. 25 in protest against the reckless anti-DPRK moves of the U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces.
					 The statement said:
					
					 The U.S. and the south Korean puppet forces are desperately moving to "bring down the social system" of the DPRK through a "beheading operation" targeting its supreme headquarters.
					
					 This is the height of hostile acts to destroy the socialist system in the DPRK at any cost.
					
					 The U.S. and south Korean puppet forces should respond to the peace proposal of the DPRK, though belatedly, properly understanding its strength and will.

articles.title: Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by Czech Newspaper
articles.content:
Crucial Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by Czech Newspape
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The editorial board of the Czech newspaper Prostejopska Pravda made public a statement on Feb. 24 in support of the crucial statement of the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The determination of the Korean people to uncompromisingly struggle against the U.S., the boss of imperialists, is evoking a great response among Czech people and readers, the statement noted, adding:
					
					 Many Czech people are supporting the Korean people boldly struggling against the imperialists threatening the use of nuclear weapons.
					
					 The Korean people's morality, ethics, will and practical activities are resolutely rejecting the West's false propaganda and making the public pay deep attention to the events happening in the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Czech people are expressing sympathy with the DPRK which is actually standing up against the U.S.
					
					 The editorial board hopes that the situation in the peninsula would become stable to help the Korean people advance the building of the country and the revolution in peace.

articles.title: S. Korean People's Anti-U.S., Anti-"Government" Struggle Reported in Argentine and U.S.
articles.content:
S. Korean People's Anti-U.S., Anti-"Government" Struggle Reported in Argentine and U.S.
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- South Korean people's daily-mounting anti-U.S., anti-"government" struggle was reported in Argentine and the U.S. on Feb. 24 and 27.
					 An internet bulletin of the Communist Party of Argentina dealt with the south Korean people's daily-mounting struggle protesting against the U.S. deployment of THAAD in south Korea and the "government's" anti-reunification moves and disgraceful acts of kowtowing to the U.S.
					
					 Reporting that a large-scale demonstration took place in Seoul against the Park Geun Hye regime, AP told:
					
					 Recently a lot of south Korean people held a demonstration before the Seoul City Office in denunciation of the "government's labor reform" and "bill on preventing terrorism" encroaching upon personal freedom.
					
					 Demonstrators took to streets holding the placards bearing slogans opposing the labor reform, demanding Park's resignation and denouncing the "government".
					
					 In south Korea discontent at the Park's regime is growing among the public.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on British Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Posted on British Website
 Pyongyang, March 4 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy posted on its website supreme leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Hasten the Final Victory through a Revolutionary Ideological Offensive" on February 25.
					 It is the speech made by him at the 8th Conference of Ideological Workers of the Workers' Party of Korea on February 25, Juche 103 (2014). It says that the whole course of the Korean revolution can be called a period of ideological work to give fullest play to the might of the truth of the revolutionary ideology of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It also indicates tasks and ways facing the field of the party ideological work at present.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un dirige tiro de ensayo de nuevo lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso caliber
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un dirige tiro de ensayo de nuevo lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso calibre
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Llegaron a una etapa tan peligrosa la presion politica y economica, chantaje y locura de agresion militar del imperialismo yanqui y sus fuerzas seguidoras, que ilegalizaron hasta el derecho independiente de un Estado soberano inventando nueva y bandidesca "resolucion de sancion" tras cuestionar el fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear y el lanzamiento de satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4, que son opciones autodefensivas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					En visperas de la batalla enconada, en que todo el pueblo coreano espera la orden de combate de aniquilar a los enemigos con la firme voluntad de represalia al imperialismo norteamericano y la banda de traidores de Park Geun-hye, se realizo el tiro de ensayo para comprobar el poderio de ojiva de proyectil teledirigido de nuevo lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso calibre a ubicarse para la guerra real de las artillerias de reserva del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					El Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la RPDC y Comandante Supremo del EPC, dirigio en terreno el tiro de ensayo de lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso calibre de nuevo tipo.
					
					En el puesto de vigilancia, hizo detallado conocimiento del plan de tiro de ensayo de lanzacohetes y los datos tacticos y tecnicos del proyectil teledirigido y dio orden de tiro de ensayo.
					
					En el tiro de ensayo realizado de diversos modos de tiro con el proyectil detonador y fragmentacion, penetrativo en el subsuelo y metralla, quedo averiguado que es tan increible la efectividad de destruccion y de accion de la ojiva de proyectil mejorada en su poderio al mezclar con las sustancias de alta energia.
					
					El Mariscal se mostro muy satisfecho al ver el acierto de proyectil teledirigido y el poderio de la ojiva de proyectil que hace anicos los solidos y supuestos abrigos para efectivos, tanques y canones de enemigos.
					
					El desarrollo de arma jucheano de la epoca del digno Partido del Trabajo fue logrado por las hazanas indelebles del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il, quienes dedicaron todos los suyos para el fortalecimiento de las autoctonas fuerzas de defensa nacional y la politica del PTC de dar prioridad a las ciencias y tecnicas de defensa nacional, subrayo el Mariscal y agrego que esto demuestra elocuentemente cuan inagotable es el poderio de la industria belica independiente de nuestro pais.
					
					Gracias a la produccion en cadena de los lanzacohetes reactivos autopropulsados de gran calibre a nuestro estilo, llegamos a mejorar mas la capacidad de ataque de nuestro ejercito, dijo con alegria.
					
					Ahora los enemigos hacen ultimos coletazos elaborando la "operacion de descabezamiento" y el "derrumbe del regimen" para atentar a nuestra dignidad, soberania y derecho a vivir, debido a lo cual la situacion se ha hecho tan delicada, dijo y anadio que por tanto, todos nuestros modos de enfrentamiento militar contra los enemigos se convertiran en el otro de ataque preventivo.
					
					Sumandose a las maniobras de EE.UU., Park Geun-hye aumenta imprudentemente las fuerzas armadas abogando por el "ataque preventivo", refirio y destaco que la furia de ella adelantara solo la autodestruccion.
					
					Observare que sofisterias soltaran y como se desesperaran los enemigos, que han venido intentando arrebatar el derecho independiente a usar el cosmos con fines pacificos de la RPDC, en cuanto a nuestra prueba de nuevo arma realizada en visperas de sus ejercicios militares conjuntos contra nosotros, dijo.
					
					La rama de ciencias belicas deben colocar lo mas pronto posible en las zonas de operacion de la Comandancia Suprema las armas de ataque desarrolladas recientemente inclusive el lanzacohetes reactivo autopropulsado de grueso calibre, para que los enemigos no duerman tranquilamente hasta el ultimo momento de su derrota final, continuo.
					
					El unico metodo para defender la soberania y el derecho a vivir de nuestra nacion en la situacion tan critica de hoy es mantener equilibrios de las fuerzas al fortalecer cuantitativa y cualitativamente las fuerzas armadas nucleares, subrayo y  enfatizo la necesidad de hacer preparativos para lanzar en cualquier momento las ojivas nucleares ubicadas para la guerra real a fin de defender el Estado.
					
					Expreso a los funcionarios, cientificos y tecnicos de la rama de ciencias belicas una esperanza y conviccion de que al seguir desarrollando nuevos armamentos modernos de tipo de ataque, logren otro salto en el fortalecimiento de las fuerzas militar el presente ano en que se celebrara el VII Congreso del Partido, para fortalecer mas la capacidad defensiva del pais.
					
					Le acompanaron el secretario del Comite Central del PTC, Choe Ryong Hae, los subjefes de departamento del CC del PTC, Hong Yong Chil y Kim Jong Sik y el coronel general de las fuerzas terrestres Yun Tong Hyon, viceministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares.

articles.title: RPDC respondera con intransigencia a "resolucion de sancion" de ONU
articles.content:
RPDC respondera con intransigencia a "resolucion de sancion" de ONU
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del gobierno de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea (RPDC) hizo publica el dia 4 la siguiente declaracion:
					Estados Unidos y otras potencias y sus seguidores, pasmados ante la prueba de bomba de hidrogeno y el exitoso lanzamiento del satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4 de la RPDC, fabricaron a la madrugada del 3 de marzo la "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC no. 2270 abusando del nombre del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					Tan pronto como se aprobara la "resolucion", el mandatario estadounidense Obama publico un "mensaje de bienvenida", e hizo al secretario de Estado Kerry presentar la "declaracion de apoyo". Y otros fulanos y menganos tambien estan acorde con ellos. 
					
					Hablando de la eficacia de la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU", EE.UU. anuncio hasta la "sancion por separado" fijando a los funcionarios medulares de nuestro ejercito y gobierno como objetos de "sancion especial". 
					
					Tambien, Japon emitio un "comentario de apoyo" de Abe y la "declaracion de apoyo" del canciller Kishida. 
					
					Hasta la banda surcoreana de Park Geun-hye transmitio en la noche avanzada la llamada "declaracion" abogando por la "sancion mas fuerte y comprensiva" y "mensaje rotundo". 
					
					No es asombrosa ni novedosa la presente "resolucion de sancion" fabricada al cabo de discusion de 57 dias por EE.UU. y otras potencias y sus seguidores, aturdidos ante la prueba de bomba de hidrogeno y el lanzamiento exitoso del satelite Kwangmyongsong-4 que estremecieron el mundo en el umbral del ano nuevo. Ya lo hemos previsto. 
					
					Lo problematico es que la presente "resolucion de sancion" es el crimen internacional mas abierto y mas cruel tendente a aislar y aplastar la RPDC, Estado soberano independiente y justo, bajo los injustos pretextos.
					
					Ya hemos aclarado que la prueba de bomba de hidrogeno de la RPDC es una medida de aseguramiento del disuasivo nuclear para defender la soberania del pais y el derecho a la subsistencia de la nacion frente a la politica norteamericana de hostilidad y su creciente amenaza nuclear, y tambien deviene el ejercicio del derecho legitimo de un Estado soberano reconocido en virtud de la ley internacional. 
					
					Con respecto a que EE.UU. y otras potencias y sus satelites fabricaron la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, documento que amenaza gravemente la soberania de la RPDC y desafia frontalmente a nuestra justa causa, el gobierno de la RPDC aclara a todo el mundo la siguiente posicion: 
					
					Primero, rechazamos fuertemente la "resolucion de sancion" del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU calificandola de provocacion mas cruel contra la RPDC, prestigioso Estado soberano e independiente. 
					
					La presente "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC es un documento criminal aprobado por el Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU violando brutalmente la justicia internacional y la imparcialidad actuando al son que le tocan EE.UU. y otras potencias y sus satelites perdiendo su mision de asegurar la paz y la seguridad del mundo. 
					
					Desde el principio, no hemos reconocido ni una vez todas las "resoluciones de sancion" anti-RPDC de la ONU. 
					
					  Segundo, tomaremos de continuo las contramedidas rotundas ya que Estados Unidos y otras potencias y sus seguidores optaron el camino de pisotear abiertamente nuestra soberania y  nuestro derecho a subsistencia.
					
					  En nuestro enfrentamiento se movilizaran varios medios y metodos inclusive la poderosa y despiadada contramedida fisica.
					
					  No estaremos jamas con brazos cruzados ante la realidad en que se ven violados la soberania y el derecho a subsistencia del pais.
					
					  Si se produce un incidente inesperado en la Peninsula Coreana y sus contornos, EE.UU. y otras potencias, las fuerzas seguidoras y los que estan involucrados en la presente "resolucion" de la ONU se responsabilizaran totalmente de su consecuencia.
					
					Tercero, con motivo del presente archi-crimen internacional cometido esta vez por el CS de la ONU, avivaremos mas las llamaradas de la lucha en escala mundial para quebrantar decididamente el injusto y desigual orden politico internacional.
					
					No podemos estar por mas tiempo con brazos cruzados ante la corriente mundial en que se violan la justicia y la imparcialidad y reinan la pauta de doble rasero y la injusticia.
					
					Es la posicion de la RPDC el que esta no puede tolerar jamas la realidad en que se niegan a su antojo la legalidad y la ilegalidad segun la pauta de Estados Unidos y otras potencias y se pisotean flagrantemente la justicia y la veracidad.
					
					Quien diga lo que quiera, la RPDC intensificara mas en el futuro tambien el disuasivo nuclear autodefensivo al tomar firmemente la bandera de linea de desarrollo paralelo y avanzara con valentia por el camino optado ya hacia la cima de la potencia de satelite.
					
					El mundo vera correctamente como la RPDC, que se enfrenta rotundamente a la "resolucion de sancion" de la ONU, acaba con la historia criminal de la ONU caida en la escena de arbitrariedad de EE.UU. y otras potencias y los imbeciles que les siguen a ciegas y como establece la justicia y la imparcialidad internacionales.

articles.title: Portavoz de MINREX condena "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC de ONU
articles.content:
Portavoz de MINREX condena "resolucion de sancion" anti-RPDC de ONU
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea publico el dia 3 una declaracion que sigue:
					Estados Unidos invento otra "resolucion de sancion" abusando del nombre del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU  cuestionando la prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno y el lanzamiento de satelite de la RPDC.
					
					  La presente "resolucion" sin precedente tanto en su brutalidad como en su ilegalidad, es un invento bandidesco injustificable.
					
					  Si es problematica la posesion de las armas nucleares, hay que cuestionar primero a EE.UU. que poseyo las armas nucleares por primera vez en este mundo y las uso unicamente.
					
					Y deben ser cuestionadas merecidamente la politica hostil y la amenaza nuclear de EE.UU. que nos obligo a poseerlas.
					
					  La posesion de las armas nucleares de la RPDC es la inevitable opcion de autodefensa para hacer frente a EE.UU., pais de mayor poseedor y usuario de las armas nucleares, que definio la digna RPDC como "eje del mal" y objeto del ataque preventivo nuclear y vino intensificando las maniobras hostiles y la amenaza nuclear contra ella introduciendo los pertrechos de guerra nuclear de todo tipo.
					
					  Ellos cuestionan que la prueba de la bomba de hidrogeno y el lanzamiento del satelite de la RPDC son la violacion de las "resoluciones" anteriores del CS de la ONU, pero las mismas "resoluciones" devienen el producto de la coaccion inventado erroneamente fuera de la autoridad del CS.
					
					  Si el CS de la ONU tiene la autoridad de prohibir la prueba nuclear de los paises individuales, ?por que se necesitan el Tratado de No Proliferacion (TNP) y el tratado de prohibicion de la prueba nuclear?
					
					  El lanzamiento del satelite es el derecho legitimo de un Estado soberano.
					
					  La RPDC elaboro el plan quinquenal estatal para el desarrollo del cosmos ejerciendo dignamente el derecho independiente reconocido en virtud de la ley internacional, segun lo cual lanzo exitosamente y opera normalmente el satelite de observacion de la Tierra Kwangmyongsong-4.
					
					  ?En que parte de la Carta de la ONU esta estipulada la autoridad del CS de la ONU para poder privar a los paises miembros del derecho al uso con fines pacificos del cosmos dilucidado en la ley internacional?
					
					  Para tomar por cuestion el lanzamiento del satelite de la RPDC, hay que cuestionar a todos los paises lanzadores de los satelites inclusive EE.UU. 
					
					Colmado de la hostilidad a la RPDC, EE.UU. invento hasta los groseros articulos de sancion como "prohibicion de exportacion e importacion de mercancias de lujo" a fin de impedir la entrada de los equipos y materiales deportivos como las instalaciones del campo de esqui que no tienen nada que ver con el desarrollo de armas. 
					
					Persigue el objetivo hostil y anti-DDHH de frenar las risas de felicidad del pueblo coreano que resuenan en el Campo de Esqui Masikryong y otros lugares de recreo, impedir la vida lujosa del pueblo que comprometio el PTC al pueblo, y a la larga, derrocar el regimen socialista coreano. 
					
					Denunciamos categoricamente y rechazamos totalmente la presente "resolucion" y otras anteriores anti-RPDC del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU, que se malemplean a los designios politicos de algunas potencias e infringen brutalmente la soberania y los derechos al desarrollo y a la subsistencia de Estado soberano, calificandolas de documentos criminales carentes de la imparcialidad, la legalidad y la moralidad. 
					
					Muchos paises miembros de la ONU, en particular, los paises pequenos demandan la reforma democratica del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU que mantiene la vieja estructura y caracter mas indemocraticos y parciales en el sistema de aparatos de la ONU y expresan su repugnancia con la desatencion a las injustas resoluciones del Consejo de Seguridad de la ONU. 
					
					Hemos logrado el autofortalecimiento en medio de las sanciones y bloqueo de EE.UU. Esta vez tambien hemos previsto la sancion de EE.UU. 
					
					La capacidad de autofortalecimiento de la RPDC es el poderio del pueblo que aun en medio de la incesante politica de hostilidad y la sancion de EE.UU., convirtio la patria en el pais poseedor de bomba de hidrogeno y lanzador de satelite artificial confiando solo en sus propias fuerzas y ateniendose en su propia inteligencia y tecnica. 
					
					Seria una gran equivocacion si piensan en que se saldria con la suya la sancion anti-RPDC. 
					
					El fortalecimiento del disuasivo nuclear de la RPDC es el digno ejercicio del derecho a la autodefensa a ser mantenido mientras no elimine la politica norteamericana de hostilidad a la RPDC. Y el lanzamiento de satelite es el desarrollo de cosmos que corresponde al derecho legitimo de Estado soberano que continuara aunque se acabe la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU. 
					
					En el futuro cercano el mundo observara mucho mas medidas y acciones de la RPDC en el proceso de materializacion de la linea de desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares. 
					
					La responsabilidad de la desaparicion de la desnuclearizacion de la Peninsula Coreana recaera enteramente sobre EE.UU. que ha negado de principio a cabo la renuncia de la politica hostil a la RPDC.

articles.title: CRPP condena "ley de DDHH del Norte" y "ley de prevencion de terrorismo" de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP condena "ley de DDHH del Norte" y "ley de prevencion de terrorismo" de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- En relacion con que bajo la presion de Park Geun-hye, la Asamblea Nacional del Sur de Corea aprobo el dia 2 a la fuerza la "ley de DDHH del Norte" y la "ley de prevencion del terrorismo", el portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el 4 una declaracion.
					La fabricacion de las dos leyes resulta grave e intolerable provocacion a la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y crimen antinacional que lleva al borde de la guerra las relaciones intercoreanas, senala la nota y continua:
					
					Todos los visitantes a la RPDC quedan emocionados por el regimen socialista donde se practica globalmente la politica a favor del pueblo. 
					
					Sin embargo, los politiqueros surcoreanos y los intrigantes internacionales de DDHH, que no saben nada de la RPDC ni la visitaron ni una vez, fabricaron la "ley de DDHH" cuestionando su situacion de "DDHH", a base de los testigos falsificados de unas escorias humanas que se huyeron abandonando sin vacilacion alguna a sus consanguineos y la patria por haber cometido los crimenes intolerables. Esto es una cinica farsa politica y abierto engano a la opinion publica interna y externa. 
					
					Para colmo, la fabricacion de la "ley de prevencion del terrorismo" anti-RPDC es una caricatura politica de que se avergonzara hasta el caudillo del terrorismo internacional EE.UU. Al mismo tiempo, es una imprudencia encaminada a manchar la imagen prestigiosa de la RPDC y estrechar el cerco de aislamiento y aplastamiento sobre ella. 
					
					Esta vez, Park Geun-hye demostro al mundo entero su naturaleza asquerosa de maniaca de enfrentamiento, tirana fascista y traidora a la nacion. 
					
					Dado que la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye cometio atrevidamente la provocacion total a la dignidad y regimen de la RPDC, nuestros militares y civiles tomaran las contramedidas rotundas.

articles.title: Se conmemora en RPDC 70o aniversario de  promulgacion de Ley de Reforma Agraria
articles.content:
Se conmemora en RPDC 70o aniversario de  promulgacion de Ley de Reforma Agraria
Pyongyang, 4 de marzo (ACNC) -- Los militares y civiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea conmemoran hoy el 70o aniversario de la promulgacion de la Ley de la Reforma Agraria.
					El Presidente Kim Il Sung presento la consigna de "!La tierra a los campesinos que la trabajan!", a base de la experiencia adquirida en el fragor de la revolucion antijaponesa, e hizo preparativos para la reforma agraria. Y el 5 de marzo del 35 (1946) de la Era Juche promulgo la Ley de la Reforma Agraria en Corea del Norte elaborada por si mismo.
					
					La promulgacion de la Ley de la Reforma Agraria fue un acontecimiento historico que forjo una nueva historia de solucion del problema de campesinos y de agricultura en Corea. 
					
					La Ley de la Reforma Agraria hizo realizar el anhelo de siglo de los campesinos coreanos de hacerse verdaderos duenos de la tierra, eliminar completamente las relaciones feudales de posesion de la tierra existentes en los campos rurales del pais y allanar el camino de la revolucion continua hacia el socialismo.
					
					Tuvo lugar el dia 4 en la Casa Central de la Juventud el acto central por el 70o aniversario de promulgacion de la Ley de la Reforma Agraria.
					
					Participaron Pak Pong Ju, Yang Hyong Sop, Kwak Pom Gi, Ro Tu Chol, el vicepremier y ministro de Agricultura, el presidente del Comite Central de la Union de Trabajadores Agricolas de Corea, funcionarios de ministerios, organos centrales, instituciones del partido, el poder y de direccion de agricultura de la capital, y trabajadores agricolas. 
					
					El informe de la ocasion estuvo a cargo de Pak Pong Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y primer ministro del Consejo de Ministros de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					El dijo que la historia de 70 anos transcurridos despues de la reforma agraria brilla como anales orgullosos en que bajo la sabia orientacion del partido y el lider, se han alcanzado en los campos rurales socialistas del pais las innovaciones revolucionarias y el avance no vistos en la historia nacional. 
					
					Apunto que seran eternas junto con la historia de construccion de un Estado prospero las proezas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes abrieron una nueva historia de transformaciones de los campos rurales socialistas y asentaron la base de eterna duracion para el desarrollo de la agricultura. 
					
					Llamo a los funcionarios y trabajadores de la rama agricola a conquistar sin falta la meta de produccion cerealera de este ano, presentada por el PTC continuando el espiritu y temperamento de lucha de los campesinos patrioticos de generacion anterior.
